author: William Yang, William Yang
title: Black people in China 'banned from McDonalds and evicted from their homes' over coronavirus fears
description: 'They treat us like animals,' says Max, who was forced from his apartment and put into quarantine – despite testing negative for Covid19.
content:
Notice: Weve been informed that from now on black people are not allowed to enter the restaurant, read the sign outside McDonalds in Guangzhou. It advised that all black patrons notify the local police and seek medical isolation.
McDonalds has since removed … [+6436 chars]
